title: Trump sends warning after Russia threats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's sending two U.S. nuclear subs to reposition after Dmitry Medvedev referenced the Soviet-era “dead hand” system.

title: Trump’s new tariffs: Winners and losers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s new round of global tariffs is triggering major economic shifts. Here's who stands to gain and who’s taking the biggest hits.

title: What does TACO mean? Trump issues new tariffs after two delays
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a new slate of tariffs on Aug. 1, the second deadline after Liberation Day. TACO stands for 'Trump Always Chickens Out.'

title: Smithsonian responds after Trump removed from impeachment exhibit
shortDescription: "A future and updated exhibit will include all impeachments," according to a statement from the Smithsonian.

title: Trump orders firing of Labor statistics head after weak jobs report
shortDescription: Trump ordered the firing of Erika McEntarfer, the U.S. commissioner of Labor Statistics, accusing her without evidence of manipulating jobs figures.

title: Trump envoy visits troubled Gaza aid operation
shortDescription: Steve Witkoff visited a site run by the U.S.-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation in what he said was an effort to create a new aid plan.

title: Trump officials visit Gaza aid sites amid starvation crisis
shortDescription: Trump's Special Envoy to the Middle East Steve Witkoff visits Gaza strip amid Israel's starvation of Palestinians.

title: Who is Triple H? 'Strong guy' joined Trump in fitness test signing
shortDescription: Trump signed an executive order bringing back the presidential fitness test with Paul Levesque (Triple H), Harrison Butker and Lawrence Taylor.

title: Trump says he ordered 2 nuclear subs moved after Russia nuclear threat
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he ordered the submarines moved "just in case these foolish and inflammatory statements are more than just that."

title: 'DO YOUR JOB': Trump urges senators to skip summer break
shortDescription: Senate Republicans have a major backlog of nominations as Democrats drag their feet, frustrating the president.

title: Trump's stunning Swiss tariffs gives Alpine country's watches hard time
shortDescription: The Swiss watch industry has been suffering from weak global demand and sales. A new 39% tariff on Swiss goods from the may add to their hard time.

title: Trump's tariff deadline sparks angry protests around the world
shortDescription: President Trump's new tariffs have sparked protests in Canada, Brazil, South Korea and India.

title: Kamala Harris gives revealing take on 2024 election loss to Colbert
shortDescription: Former Vice President Kamala Harris denied she was sitting out the 2026 California governor's because she has still has her eye on the White House

title: Trump fires official after weak jobs report as tariffs soar: updates
shortDescription: An anemic July jobs report boosted expectations the Federal Reserve might lower interest rates in September. Trump said the jobs report was "rigged."

title: Trump's envoy meets Netanyahu for Gaza aid, ceasefire push
shortDescription: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff met Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in a bid to salvage Gaza truce talks and tackle a humanitarian crisis.

title: 'Rage Against the Regime' protests planned against Trump admin
shortDescription: The protests across the United States also fall on Vice President JD Vance’s birthday.

title: More missiles: Senators want billions to renew US stockpiles
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's counter-Houthi campaign is one example of "how quickly we're going through advanced munitions," Sen. Chris Coons said.

title: Biden says Trump is trying to 'dismantle the Constitution'
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden said that the Trump administration is trying to "dismantle the Constitution" and "erase justice" in a July 31 speech
